data.eml:eml: Melitids (Crustacea: Amphipoda) of the genera Ceradocus and Mallacoota from Rodrigues Island (Indian Ocean)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Appadoo, Chandani, Myers, Alan A. (2006): Melitids (Crustacea: Amphipoda) of the genera Ceradocus and Mallacoota from Rodrigues Island (Indian Ocean). Zootaxa 1370: 1-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174882
